member.name: T:Gasconade.Log
member.summary: Log sender static container. Use this to send your log messages. Inject log suppliers to do the final writing

member.summary: Send a warning-level message
member.param: The message object. The class should have a LogMessageTemplate attribute

member.name: T:Gasconade.LogMessageDescriptionAttribute
member.summary: This attribute gives a description of the log message: the meaning, when it would be written, and actions that can be taken in response

member.name: P:Gasconade.LogMessageDescriptionAttribute.Description
member.summary: An overall description of the log message and its general meaning

member.name: P:Gasconade.LogMessageDescriptionAttribute.Causes
member.summary: Optional: A description of why this log might be triggered

member.name: P:Gasconade.LogMessageDescriptionAttribute.Actions
member.summary: Optional: A description of action to be taken based on the log being triggered

member.name: M:Gasconade.LogMessageDescriptionAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Gives the string template of a log message. Replacements can be added in the style of `{PropertyName}`
